titles.title: Recognizing the November 5, 2009, attack on Fort Hood, Texas, as an act of radical Islamic terrorism and Jihad.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 12/14/2011--Introduced. Recognizes the November 5, 2009, attack on Fort Hood, Texas, as an act of radical Islamic terrorism and Jihad against the U.S. Armed Forces.
